guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for articaine / epinephrine and CYB5R3, G6PD

text.html: "Although all patients are at risk for methemoglobinemia, patients with glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency, ... are more susceptible to developing clinical manifestations of the condition. If local anesthetics must be used in these patients, close monitoring for symptoms and signs of methemoglobinemia is recommended." See label for more information.
